subject: Prostitution
Soccer
Child Abuse and Neglect
lead_paragraph: The Paris prosecutor’s office said two players accused of soliciting a minor would face trial at the behest of a judge, even though the prosecutor’s office has argued the charges should be dropped.
snippet: The Paris prosecutor’s office said two players accused of soliciting a minor would face trial at the behest of a judge, even though the prosecutor’s office has argued the charges should be dropped.
